questions.text: Which of these is an example of a 'Smart Factory' application?
options: Manual quality inspection
Predictive maintenance on machinery
Paper-based work orders
Fixed-schedule machine operation

questions.text: How does IIoT contribute to supply chain optimization?
options: By making all deliveries happen at night
By providing real-time tracking and monitoring of goods
By eliminating the need for warehouses
By replacing human workers with robots in all roles
questions.correctAnswer: By providing real-time tracking and monitoring of goods

questions.text: In 'Smart Agriculture', what can IIoT sensors be used for?
options: To change the weather
To monitor soil moisture and nutrient levels
To automatically plant seeds from the cloud
To communicate with birds
questions.correctAnswer: To monitor soil moisture and nutrient levels

questions.text: A 'Smart Grid' uses IIoT technology to:
options: Generate more electricity from the same sources
Make electricity free for everyone
Improve the efficiency, reliability, and sustainability of electricity distribution
Store electricity indefinitely
questions.correctAnswer: Improve the efficiency, reliability, and sustainability of electricity distribution

questions.text: Predictive maintenance is a key benefit of IIoT. What does it involve?
options: Repairing equipment only after it breaks down
Maintaining all equipment on a fixed, rigid schedule
Using data analytics to predict when equipment will fail and servicing it beforehand
Replacing all equipment annually
questions.correctAnswer: Using data analytics to predict when equipment will fail and servicing it beforehand

questions.text: In healthcare, IIoT (often called IoMT - Internet of Medical Things) can be used for:
options: Diagnosing all diseases automatically
Remote patient monitoring
Replacing doctors with robots
Manufacturing medicines at home

questions.text: What is a major challenge in implementing IIoT in existing 'brownfield' industrial environments?
options: There is no challenge; it is always easy
Lack of available electricity
Integrating new IIoT technology with legacy systems and equipment
Employees are too familiar with old systems
questions.correctAnswer: Integrating new IIoT technology with legacy systems and equipment

questions.text: What does OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness) measure?
options: The age of the equipment
The manufacturing productivity, combining availability, performance, and quality
The color of the equipment
The number of people required to operate the equipment
questions.correctAnswer: The manufacturing productivity, combining availability, performance, and quality

questions.text: How can a digital twin be used in a smart factory?
options: As a replacement for all physical machines
To simulate and test production changes without affecting the physical line
As a video game for employees
To store employee records
questions.correctAnswer: To simulate and test production changes without affecting the physical line

questions.text: Which of these is a benefit of using IIoT in the oil and gas industry?
options: Finding new oil reserves automatically
Making oil cheaper
Monitoring pipeline integrity and preventing leaks
Changing the chemical composition of oil
questions.correctAnswer: Monitoring pipeline integrity and preventing leaks
